title: Disable preview pane "after" search
content:
Hello there, Disabling the preview pane in the folder view works as expected, pressing "F8" will disable the preview pane and this remain disabled even after restarting TB. This does not work on the search function, to replicate: 1) make a search 2) open a message in the search result 3) hit "F8" (nothing appens) 4) then if You resize the preview pane until it disappear and You go to "Structure/Preview Pane" it's disabled (?) 5) close the message, open another result and the preview pane will reapper just a little resized...

What we are missing? It is possible there's an advanced settings under "Config editor" to change this behaviour?

Thanks Kind Regards Rob

title: problem with viewing a message
content:
For some time I have been having trouble displaying previously downloaded and read messages, mainly in the inbox. After clicking in a message its subject and receiver is different or invisible.
